```{r}
#| label: fig-prisma

library(consort)
library(dplyr)
library(readr)

# データの読み込み (PRISMA 2020 Flowchart)
dfMeta <- read_csv("data/dfMetaPubMed_final.csv")

out <- consort_plot(data = dfMeta,
                    orders = c(
                      Study = "Cycling AND Walking\nHealth Related\nPubMed",
                      Excl1    = "Excluded",
                      Study = "Title and Abstract\nRisk of Bias 2.0",
                      Excl2    = "Excluded",
                      Study = "Meta-anaysis\n"
                    ),
                    side_box = c("Excl1", "Excl2"),
                    
                    # labels = c("1" = "Identification",
                    #            "2" = "Screening",
                    #            "3" = "Eligibility"),
                    # 
                    cex = 0.9)  # ここでラベルの回転を試みる

plot(out)
```
